name: Blue world
description: Hundreds of thousands years ago, Earth was a sparkling light blue superorganism. Its glow was the most beautiful thing in the Milky Way, and made the other planets just planets. Anyone who saw the bright blue planet of infinite space felt something very strong inside. The simple act of observing its beauty was a reason to get emotional and dive into a true cascade of feelings that bubbled and spread happiness. There, of course, it was a cradle for all forms of life.
